about_the_game:
Cosmantic Cluster Demo

✪ Features the first couple of stages and dialogue from the story mode!

✪ Local 2 player vs mode with 6 playable characters and a handful of stages to play and customize with!

✪ 3 part tutorial breaking down the game!

✪ Various options for audio and graphical options!

We are looking for feedback on the game! Any constructive criticism is welcome. Please leave your feedback or bugs found here on Steam or our Discord.
Cosmantic Cluster is planned to be at Steam Next Fest October! Wishlist and follow our socials to stay up to date on any updates or changes.

Thank you!

Cosmantic Cluster Demo

✪ Features the first couple of stages and dialogue from the story mode!

✪ Local 2 player vs mode with 6 playable characters and a handful of stages to play and customize with!

✪ Various options for audio and graphical options!

We are looking for feedback on the game! Any constructive criticism is welcome. Please leave your feedback or bugs found here on Steam or our Discord.
Cosmantic Cluster is planned to be at Steam Next Fest October! Wishlist and follow our socials to stay up to date on any updates or changes.

Thank you!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or higher
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: i5 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650/Radeon HD 7770

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave Ver 10.14.6
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 1536 MB

name: Cosmantic Cluster Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i5 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650/Radeon HD 7770

short_description: Cosmantic Cluster Demo has the first couple stages of the story. 2 player vs with some customization options and 3 part tutorial. We are looking for feedback and bugs so please leave your feedback here on Steam or Discord. The game will be at Steam Next Fest October so wishlist to stay up to date!
